alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 17 at 10:15AM CST until January 18 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM CST THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Rapides, Avoyelles, Allen, Evangeline and St. Landry Parishes. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Watch, from this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry
